text: The news coming out of Parkland, Florida, is absolutely heartbreaking. My prayers are with the families, teachers, students, all the first responders and the entire community.

I was saddened to hear of the passing of a close friend and mentor, former U.S. Rep. Joe Knollenberg. Joe epitomized what it means to be a true public servant. His honorable service in the U.S. Army & his legacy of community service will forever serve as an example for us.

Last week, I voted in favor of bipartisan legislation that would require athletic governing bodies like USA Gymnastics to report sex-abuse allegations to law enforcement immediately & expand the statute of limitations for these types of crimes.
I was aboard the train to the GOP retreat today and am okay. Please keep those in the truck and all those who were injured this morning in your prayers.
First and foremost, my heart goes out to the victims, their families and all those whose lives were forever scarred by the horrific acts of Larry Nassar.

Passing the spending bill in the Senate requires 60 votes. With only 51 Republican senators, only Democrats can prevent a shutdown. There's absolutely nothing in this funding bill that Democrats are opposing & they're advancing a reckless shutdown strategy.

The Great Lakes are more than just water. They represent our heritage, recreation, resources & jobs. As a lifelong #MI resident, I believe each of us has a responsibility to ensure they're preserved for future generations.

As a result of tax reform 100+ companies have announced benefits for their employees & in Michigan that means:
  
✅ Bonuses for 7k AT&T employees
✅ Bonuses for 119 Bank of America financial centers 
✅ Bonuses for 2.6k Fifth Third Bankcorp employees
From my family to yours, I hope you've had a relaxing and bountiful Thanksgiving, #MI08. We are especially grateful for our brave men and women in uniform who are defending our freedom today.
On #VeteransDay, we set aside time to honor their sacrifice – their immeasurable effort, time, and dedication to our country. They deserve this recognition every single day of our lives.
Thank you to all of our veterans for dedicating their lives to making our country its very best. #VeteransDay
Despicable act of terror in #NYC today. These cowards will not win. Praying for the innocent victims and their families amidst this tragedy.
Deeply saddened, shocked to learn of the horrific shooting in #LasVegas last night. Praying for all the victims, getting more details today.
What happened in Charlottesville was a disgusting display of bigotry and hate by white supremacists. Violence, racism cannot be tolerated.
Thanks to @LSU for sending us hats for tonight's game. We will wear them proudly for our friend @SteveScalise! #CongressionalBaseballGame
The @CapitolPolice saved our lives yesterday. Please thank the next police officer you see. These men and women are heroes, every day.
It's gameday. Ready to get back on the field and play for @SteveScalise, Matt Mika & friends tonight. #CongressionalBaseballGame
Please pray for @SteveScalise and four others who were sent to area hospitals.
I was present at practice, as well as a member of my staff. Both of us are okay.
Charity baseball practice this AM when a loan gunman open fired on members of Congress and security. Several down - please pray for them.
Wishing all our friends of the Christian faith a blessed Good Friday, full of love and reflection.
Glad @POTUS is talking about our broken health care system: we must make coverage more affordable for our families and employers. #MI08
Sending my well wishes for a speedy recovery to both President Bush and Barbara. #41
Congrats @MSUMD on your grant to develop a registry for Flint residents exposed to lead drinking water – to ensure help is delivered #MI08
Prayers for everyone at the Ft. Lauderdale Airport right now - sad news coming out about the horrific violence that has taken place there.
Proud to work with @RepMarkWalker as a new member of the @RepublicanStudy Steering Committee in the 115th Congress! #MI08
The #115thCongress is officially in session! Here's to a great 2017
It's National #TaxSecurity Awareness Week, and today is all about protecting yourself online, specially during the holiday shopping season.
Praying for the Ohio State community and all those injured in the horrific attack on campus today. Follow @OSU_EMFP for the latest updates.
We have so much to be thankful for - including the service of our brave men and women in uniform. Happy Thanksgiving! #MI08
And congrats to @RepSteveStivers @RepDougCollins and @RepJasonSmith on being selected to new leadership positions! Great working with you
Congrats @SpeakerRyan @GOPLeader @SteveScalise @cathymcmorris @RepLukeMesser on leadership re-elects! Looking forward to the 115th Congress
On #VeteransDay and every day, America is proud of all the brave men & women who keep us safe and fight for our freedom. God bless our vets!
Blaming people doesn't fix anything. The people of #Flint want solutions, and the bipartisan #WRDA legislation starts that process. #MI08
Sad to learn of Shimon Peres' passing. Throughout his life of service, he never stopped working for peace. Praying for our friends in Israel
Happy birthday to one of my Chairmen, @RepGoodlatte! Make it a good one. @HouseJudiciary
Big thanks to @RepDavidRouzer & @BradSherman for signing on to my bipartisan #MobileWorkforce bill. Up to 180 House co-sponsors and growing!
We now have 178 co-sponsors of my #MobileWorkforce bill in the House, #HR2315! Another 45 Senators on board with @SenJohnThune's #S386.
State Rep. @PeterPettalia was a leader and friend to many. My deepest condolences go out to his wife and children. #MILeg
Happy #LaborDay to all the hardworking men & women who have made our country great! Hope you're enjoying this weekend #MI08
Hard to wrap my head around another terrorist attack, again in France. Praying for victims, friends, families in Nice.
Tonight @ 9pm ET @CNN will host a townhall w/ @SpeakerRyan about what we're doing in the House to build a #BetterWay forward. Tune in #MI08!
I'm up now, talking to Attorney General Lynch at the @HouseJudiciary hearing
My heart is aching for the innocent lives lost in the Orlando shooting. This is a direct threat to our freedom and we will not stand for it.
Thanks @DarrellIssa @RepRonKind @RepDonaldPayne @Call_Me_Dutch and @RepBonnie for signing on to my bipartisan #MobileWorkforce bill this wk!
Thank you, @RepErikPaulsen @RepDianeBlack @RepTimMurphy @RepTomEmmer, for supporting the victims of the 2012 fungal meningitis outbreak!
Thanks for joining our letter @RepDebDingell @RepDanKildee @RepJimCooper. We must keep fighting for victims of the 2012 meningitis outbreak!
Thank you for joining me in standing up for the victims of the 2012 fungal meningitis outbreak, @RepWalberg @RepLarryBucshon @RepWalorski!
We must fight for victims of the fungal meningitis outbreak. Thanks for joining me @RepDaveTrott @RepHuizenga @RepMoolenaar @CongressmanDan!
FACT: Americans make up only 4.6% of the world’s population but have been consuming 80% of the global #opioid supply. Let's change that.
This week, @HouseGOP is focusing on ways to address our nation's growing opioid epidemic. This issue hits close to home for us in #MI08.
On #TaxDay, we are reminded why big-government “solutions” are not the answer. #MI08
Proud to work with @RepAdamSchiff on the bipartisan #CPIA bill to #KeepKidsSafe. More than 45 cosponsors to-date!
Thanks, @boblatta @RepRichardHanna @RepMeehan, for co-sponsoring my Child Protection bill today! Let’s #KeepKidsSafe! #CPIA #MI08
Looking forward to speaking at the @HouseSmallBiz Subcommittee hearing tomorrow about my #mobileworkforce bill! @MWFCoalition #MI08
The partnership between law enforcement, @LACASAMichigan and our community is key to bringing an end to these terrible crimes. #MI08
Proud to be named a 2015 "Taxpayer Hero" by @GovWaste! Every member of Congress has a duty to fight for taxpayers. #CCAGW #MI08
Heartbreak in #Brussels today, please pray for the families and victims of these senseless tragedies. Freedom and justice will prevail.
Congrats to @MSU_Basketball on winning the #B1GTourney! Looking forward to seeing our guys continue the momentum during #MarchMadness! #MI08
Congrats to our @michiganstateu #Spartan basketball team on a great #SeniorDay, finishing the regular season strong! #GoGreen
POTUS' lofty proposal to move #Guantanamo detainees to the U.S. is against the law - and does absolutely nothing to keep our families safe.
DID YOU KNOW: American Opportunity Tax Credit allows college students or their parents to receive up to $2.5K to cover expenses like books
DID YOU KNOW: 25% of people who qualify for the Earned Income Tax Credit fail to claim it? That's worth up to $6K! #MI08 #FreeFile
#FreeFile software does the hard work for you, allows individuals to take advantage of every credit & deduction for which they are eligible.
The #FreeFile program does not cost a dime of taxpayer money - it SAVES you money! #MI08 @TaxPrepHelp
#IRS and MI Dept of Taxes save $ on #FreeFile because they spend less on processing costs, avoid the expense of building their own systems.
Everyone should get the full amount of their hard-earned tax refund, and this is exactly what the #FreeFile program is designed to do. #MI08
Since its debut in 2003, #FreeFile has helped save taxpayers more than $1.3 billion in tax preparation costs @TaxPrepHelp #MI08
70% of taxpayers (more than 100 million Americans) are eligible to use #FreeFile! @TaxPrepHelp @IRStaxpros #MI08
.@IRStaxpros and MI #FreeFile programs make it easier for eligible taxpayers to fill out their federal & state tax returns online and save $
Our FREE tax filing event is starting NOW at @LCCStars! Can't attend? Stay tuned to my Twitter for information & resources! #MI08 #TaxSeason
I am saddened by the news of Justice Antonin Scalia's passing. A respected steward of our Constitution, he leaves behind a lasting legacy.
I encourage #POTUS to sign this bill and show the world that the U.S. will stand with our allies against N. Korea's aggression.
Today I joined the House in strengthening & expanding sanctions against #NorthKorea in the wake of their recent weapons test & rocket launch
Congress CAN & WILL do better than POTUS' radical budget, which does nothing to address the $19T debt that skyrocketed under his admin #MI08
The House will take up @RepRussell's bill today, HR3662, requiring the admin to certify the lifting of sanctions on Iran
There will always be threats to our freedom. Our next President must understand this; America cannot lead from behind. #MI08 #LastSOTU
There was a noticeable gasp in the room when POTUS said no one dares to attack America... Did he already forget about #SanBernardino?
POTUS mentioned food stamps in #LastSOTU... but not the fact 46 million Americans are now in poverty. What will he do to lift them up? #MI08
POTUS has plenty of lofty term-end goals. You can bet he'll rely on Executive Orders to speed along the process... We must stand up! #MI08
According to POTUS, he's is doing everything right on foreign policy... so why do a majority of Americans feel LESS safe? #MI08 #LastSOTU
America's economy is coming back because of the hardworking men & women who made it happen, not 7yrs of #POTUS' big government burdens #MI08
#POTUS regrets the division that has grown in our nation... under his watch. #LastSOTU
#LastSOTU made it clear: it's going to be up to this Congress to get our nation back on track. #MI08 #ConfidentAmerica
We now face more division, more nat'l security concerns, and more burdensome programs holding us back than before he took office. #LastSOTU
POTUS' #LastSOTU made it clear he is more concerned with legacy-building than helping our families get ahead. #MI08
Looking forward to sharing my reaction with you after #POTUS' #lastSOTU address. #MI08
President Obama's #LastSOTU is tonight. #MI08, what are you hoping to hear for a more #ConfidentAmerica?
Please pray for the victims and families impacted by the mass shooting in San Bernardino
Shout-out to @RepDold for co-sponsoring #CPIA legislation to keep kids safe! Youth-serving orgs must have access to @FBI background checks
Great to see @SpeakerRyan sign his first bill #FY16NDAA today. Requires the president to provide a plan to defeat, not just "contain," ISIS.
We stand with France and are keeping their people in our prayers. Justice will be served to those behind these heinous acts.
Glad to see the latest #FY16NDAA pass in the House, again, by a large bipartisan margin. Mr. President, #SignTheBill and support our troops.
Time to recognize our obligation to 9/11 rescue and recovery workers! Proud to support the James Zadroga 9/11 Health and Compensation Act.
Proud to give my voice vote for @PRyan on the House floor today #MI08
My condolences to the family of Officer Randolph Holder and the @NYPD family.
With so many threats that have expanded under POTUS' watch, it is inexcusable for him to put political games ahead of responsible governing.
President Obama has single-handedly broken a 53-year history of #NDAA passage and ignored the needs of our military and their security.
Great mtg w/ Livingston Co. Catholic Charities today to learn about their counseling services & day program for those with dementia #MI08
Congrats @MSUSueP on the start of your term leading @Kiwanis! Great meeting w/ you earlier this year, I look forward to your updates! #MI08
Looking forward to touring @FlexTechHS and learning about the innovative programs they offer students in #MI08 @EdWorkforce
Please pray for the victims and families impacted by the Umpqua Community College shooting. Absolutely tragic.
Disappointed the Senate blocked legislation to extend the #PerkinsLoan Program while we continue working on higher ed reauthorization #MI08
I joined @EdWorkforce in supporting the people’s priorities by voting to eliminate #Obamacare’s auto-enrollment mandate in Committee today
LIVE: I'm talking w/ @Dakerly on @1320WILS Lansing about my legislation to extend the #PerkinsLoan Program before it expires this week #MI08
States shouldn’t be forced to send Medicaid $ to abortion providers. @RepSeanDuffy’s bill empowers states so they don't have to. #prolife
ON THE FLOOR NOW: Tune in to @CSPAN as I manage debate on HR 3594, my bill to extend the Perkins Loan Program for another year #MI08
Anxiously awaiting His Holiness Pope Francis @Pontifex in the Temple of Democracy! #PopeInDC
With Yom Kippur upon us, I’d like to wish our Jewish friends an easy fast and a meaningful day of reflection. #YomKippur #MI08
Happy birthday, @usairforce! Looking forward to the game vs @MichiganStateU tomorrow! #MI08
Prayers today as we say goodbye to local firefighter Dennis Rodeman, a great man with a lasting impact on his comrades, family and community
To all of our friends celebrating Rosh Hashanah tonight, may you have a blessed and wonderful new year ahead! #MI08
Please take a moment to join me in praying for Dennis Rodeman's loved ones and local emergency responders during this very difficult time.
No words for shock, heartbreak in #MI08 tonight with news of Lansing firefighter & U.S. Marine Corps veteran Dennis Rodeman's tragic death.
The best part of MI's ongoing economic, manufacturing growth is our talented workforce, and no place stands out like #MI08. Happy Labor Day!
UPDATE: @HouseJudiciary will continue Planned Parenthood investigation w/ a hearing next Wed, 10:30am. Talking to experts, looking into laws
Met w/ @HealthInFocus at the district office today. They rep the entire healthcare community & help patients navigate today's system. #MI08
Saddened by the horrific shooting of the #WDBJ journalists. Praying for their families & chamber official wounded in this senseless tragedy.
Great talking with students and staff at @DorseySchools Lansing today. Their campus focuses on cosmetology & medical career training #MI08
I voted for the House #CoalAshBill yesterday to ensure we manage and dispose coal ash in a way that preserves jobs and #PureMichigan
Big thank you to @DrPhilRoe for becoming the 100th co-sponsor of my #MobileWorkforce bill, #HR2315 - let's keep the momentum going! #MI08
Please pray for the victims and families impacted by the horrific shootings in #Chattanooga today
All clear - power has been restored at the Brighton district office! Let us know how we can assist you, #MI08
HEADS UP: power is out at our #MI08 district office. To reach us, please contact the D.C. office at 202-225-4872 & stay tuned for updates.
Just voted for @HurdOnTheHill's amendment because our children’s personal information should be private and secure #MI08 #StudentSuccessAct
I support @RepLeeZeldin amendment to further protect states that want to opt-out of Common Core despite previous enrollment #MI08 #edreform
Our #veterans fought for us, so the House is fighting for them. Glad legislation has passed to make secure, simple ID cards possible. #MI08
Had a great tour of @GM Grand River plant today, including an in-depth look at their history & how the Cadillac ATS and CTS are made #MI08
Wishing a very happy Father's Day to my dad and all the others out there! Blessed to spend it with my kids in #MI08 today
#ICYMI: Today, the @HouseJudiciary advanced my #MobileWorkforce bill to streamline state income tax filing & reporting standards #MI08
The House took a unanimous stand against Iran tonight, 391-0, calling for the release of MI's Amir Hekmati & US hostages #FreeAmirNow #MI08
To all the moms who've filled our lives with love, happy Mother's Day!
For the first time since 2001, the House has passed a joint 10-year #balancedbudget resolution
Today and always, we remember the #BostonBombing victims and pray for their families. Let there be justice and healing.
FACT: #StudentSuccessAct protects private ed and homeschool programs from being manipulated by the federal gov’t #edreform
FACT: H.R. 5, #StudentSuccessAct, ensures the federal gov't cannot force failed programs, like Common Core, onto our states. @EdWorkforce
#StudentSuccessAct gives more control to parents and educators – the people who know our kids best. That’s real #edreform. @EdWorkforce
If POTUS will not collaborate on #Obamacare, then we must #repeal & replace. We cannot stand by as families and businesses suffer. #MI08
Somehow, the President prefers adding $8.5 trillion to the debt than creating a budget that actually balances... #2015Budget
The House has done its part to fund DHS, I encourage @SenGaryPeters and @SenStabenow to join us.
Glad our friends in the Senate passed #KeystoneXL today. America is ready for POTUS to sign on in favor of jobs and energy independence!
Happy birthday to @WaysandMeansGOP Chairman, @RepPaulRyan!
This week, my House colleagues and I are working to #EndTrafficking
Tune in to @wjrradio to hear me on @fbtalk now, discussing my response to the #SOTU
President vowed repeatedly to provide solutions to help families get ahead, yet threatened to veto House bills which do exactly that #SOTU
We must address the rising cost of college, but punishing middle class families who have saved for their children’s education is wrong #SOTU
Working families are being squeezed, and the President’s answer is more government. #SOTU
Places like MI are experiencing lowest unemployment since '06: b/c proactive leadership @ state level is fostering pro-growth policies #SOTU
Getting ready for the President's State of the Union to begin at 9:00 p.m. What do you want to hear from him tonight? #SOTU #MI08
In tonight's #SOTU, I will be listening for ways the President plans to work with #AmericasNewCongress. Families are ready for solutions.
Our Constitution outlines a system of checks and balances – a system Congress and the President must follow. #AmericasNewCongress
Proudly supported @RepGoodlatte's bill tonight, HR 185, to rein in costly and burdensome Executive Branch regulations #AmericasNewCongress
Tonight, I voted to protect the jobs over 780,000 volunteer firefighters #MI08 #AmericasNewCongress
Tune in to the U.S. House on @CSPAN - in a few minutes, you'll see me with the gavel! #MI08
Today and always, we stand strong in the face of terror. Praying for those who lost loved ones in the Paris shooting.
